attributes.action: abandon plans to penalise family businesses with its proposed new anti-"income splitting" legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has no place intermeddling with the business arrangements of family enterprises. The proposed legislation imposes a wholly unfair burden on families to justify financial arrangements which are often entered into for subtle, fluid and intricate reasons. Its unfair to expect families to justify  such arrangements by reference to an "arms-length" standard. This government should stop taxing to hell hard working and honest families.
